nodes.text: A Blu Hope! is an interview with Kayleen Walters, the Senior Director of Marketing at Lucasfilm, about what to expect on the Star Wars: The Complete Saga Blu-ray. The article also includes interviews with Jenny Cresswell (a woman with whom Han Solo is flirting in a deleted scene of A New Hope), Garrick Hagon (Biggs Darklighter) and Anthony Forrest (Laze "Fixer" Loneozner). It was published in Star Wars Insider 128.
